source: Microbiol Immunol. 2001;45(7):539-41.

source: FEMS Immunol Med Microbiol. 1999 Oct;26(1):61-8.

authors: ['Mintz CS', 'Arnold PI', 'Johnson W', 'Schultz DR']

source: Infect Immun. 1995 Dec;63(12):4939-43.

source: Microb Pathog. 1993 Dec;15(6):469-84.

title: Distribution, expression, and long-range mapping of legiolysin gene (lly)-specific DNA sequences in legionellae.

source: Infect Immun. 1991 Sep;59(9):3333-6.

source: Infect Immun. 1987 Oct;55(10):2477-82.

authors: ['Yoshida S', 'Mizuguchi Y', 'Nikaido Y']

authors: ['Yoshida S', 'Mizuguchi Y']

source: Can J Microbiol. 1986 May;32(5):438-42.

title: Production of monoclonal antibodies against Legionella pneumophila serogroup 1.

authors: ['Miyazaki T', 'Koga H', 'Nakashima M', 'Tomonaga A', 'Kohno S', 'Hirota M', 'Saito A', 'Hara K', 'Watanabe T']

source: Microbiol Immunol. 1985;29(3):275-84.

authors: ['Smalley DL', 'Ourth DD']

source: Am J Clin Pathol. 1981 Feb;75(2):201-3.

title: Interaction of the legionnaires' disease bacterium (Legionella pneumophila) with human phagocytes. II. Antibody promotes binding of L. pneumophila to monocytes but does not inhibit intracellular multiplication.

authors: ['Horwitz MA', 'Silverstein SC']

source: J Exp Med. 1981 Feb 1;153(2):398-406.

authors: ['Horwitz MA', 'Silverstein SC']

authors: ['Smalley DL', 'Jaquess PA', 'Layne JS']
